data.title: Fubar: Balls to the Wall (2010)
data.meta_description: Movie: Fubar: Balls to the Wall (2010) info with movie soundtracks, credited songs, film score albums, reviews, news, and more.
data.text:
Soundrack Albums

There are no soundtrack albums in our database for this title. If this is incorrect, please contact us.

Song Credits

'Long Stick Goes Boom'

Written by Mark Storace, Fernando Von Arb and Chris Von Rohr

Performed by Krokus

Courtesy of Arista Records LLC

By arrangement with Sony Music Entertainment Canada, Inc.

'Return to Forever'

Written and Performed by Blood Ceremony

Courtesy of Rise Above Records

'Just a Little Bit'

Written by Dickie Peterson

Performed by Blue Cheer

Courtesy of the Island Def Jam Music Group,

under license from Universal Music Canada

'Forty-Eight'

Written by J. Makinaw, J. Matinopyes & K. OMeasoo

Performed by Team Rezofficial

Courtesy of Rezofficial Music

'Can't Fight This Feeling'

Written by Kevin Cronin

Performed by REO Speedwagon

Courtesy of HoriPro Entertainment

'Every Rose Has Its Thorn'

Written by C.C. DeVille, Robert Harry Kuykendall, Richard A. Ream & Bret Michael Sychak

Performed by Poison

Courtesy of EMI Music Canada Film & Television Music Placement Dept.

'Race With The Devil'

Written by Adrian Gurvitz

Performed by The Gun

Courtesy of Sony Music Entertainment UK Limited

By arrangement with Sony Music Entertainment Canada Inc.

'Fly to the Angels'

Written by Mark Slaughter and Dana Strum

Performed by Slaughter

Courtesy of EMI Music Canada Film & Television Music Placement Dept.

'The Nutcracker Op. 71a-March'

Written by Pyotr Illyich Tchaikovsky

Courtesy of The Magic Music People Ltd.

'More Than a Feeling'

Written by Tom Scholz

Performed by Paul J. Spence, Ian Wilson and Justin Hawkins

By arrangement with Next Decade Entertainment Inc.

--end left column 1, start right column 2--

'Dust'

Written by Tomislav Milardovic

Performed by Team Rezofficial

Courtesy of Rezofficial

'Die Young'

Written by Michael Terence Butler, Anthony Frank Iommi, Ronnie James Dio & W.T. Ward

Performed by Black Sabbath

Courtesy of Sanctuary Records,

under license from Universal Music Canada & Courtesy of Warner Music Canada Co.

'Rock Bottom'

Written by Jason Wilson, Gerry Wilson, Daryl Tully & Rob Babin

Performed by The Heelwalkers

'Truly Madly'

Written by Laurie LaPorte-Piticco, Steve Piticco and Dave McConnell

Performed by South Mountain

From the album 'Where There's a Way' on Stony Plain Records, (c) 1995

Courtesy of Stony Plain Records

'Brainbird'

Written by Andrew Sparacino

Performed by Blisst

'Necronomicon'

Written and Performed by Metalian

'The Gem'

Written and Performed by Priestess

Courtesy of Tee Pee Records

'God Rest Ye Merry Gentlemen'

Traditional, Arr. by Isabelle Noel

Performed by Isabelle Noel

Featuring Paul J. Spence

'Jingle Bell Rock'

Written by Joe Beal

Performed by Bobby Helms

Courtesy of Geffen Records,

under license from Universal Music Canada

'He's a Chubby Little Fellow'

Written by Gene Autry and Oakley Haldeman

Performed by Gene Autry

Courtesy of Sony Music Entertainment

By arrangement with Sony Music Entertainment Canada Inc.

'Every Rose Has Its Thorn'

Written by C.C. DeVille, Robert Harry Kuykendall, Richard A. Ream & Bret Michael Sychak

Performed by Justin Hawkins
